00020 #include "mainwindow.h"

00022 #include <QtGui/QDockWidget>

00024 #include "tabenvironment.h"

00032 MainWindow::MainWindow(const QString &fileName, QWidget *parent)
00033                   : QMainWindow(parent)
00034 {
00035   LOGI("Creating MainWindow");
00036   QFileInfo fileInfo(fileName);
00037 
00038   //Ogre View
00039   ogreView = new OgreView;
00040   ogreView->setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
00041   ogreView->setMinimumSize(105, 355);
00043 
00044   //tool tab
00045   toolTab = new QTabWidget;
00046   toolTab->setMinimumSize(243, 350);
00047   //  toolTab->setTabShape(QTabWidget::Triangular);
00048 
00049   objTab=new ObjectsTab();
00050   toolTab->addTab(objTab, "Objects" );
00051 
00052   TabEnvironment *tabEnv=new TabEnvironment();
00053   toolTab->addTab(tabEnv, "Environment" );
00055 
00056   //Ogre Log
00057   ogreLog = new QTextEdit;
00058   ogreLog->setReadOnly(true);
00059   ogreLog->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Ignored, QSizePolicy::Ignored);
00060   ogreLog->setMinimumSize(100, 73);
00061   ogreLog->insertPlainText(ogreView->getLog().c_str());
00062   connect(ogreLog, SIGNAL(textChanged()), this, SLOT(scrollLog()));
00063   
00064   QDockWidget *propDock = new QDockWidget("Tools");
00065   propDock->setWidget(toolTab);
00066   propDock->setAllowedAreas(Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea | Qt::RightDockWidgetArea);
00067   addDockWidget(Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea, propDock);
00068   
00069   QDockWidget *logDock = new QDockWidget("Log");
00070   logDock->setWidget(ogreLog);
00071   logDock->setAllowedAreas(Qt::TopDockWidgetArea | Qt::BottomDockWidgetArea);
00072   addDockWidget(Qt::BottomDockWidgetArea, logDock);
00073   
00074   // Init to white the diffuse and specular colors 
00075   // (NOTE: the initialisation takes effect on the "LightWindow")
00076   diffuseLightColor.setRgba(qRgba(255, 255, 255, 255));
00077   specularLightColor.setRgba(qRgba(255, 255, 255, 255));
00078   // This is our first light created by hand in LightWindow, 
00079   // so we've to put in the "blacklist" of names
00080   listName.push_back("Main Light");
00081   
00082   createActions();
00083   createMenus();
00084   createToolBars();
00085   
00086   QStatusBar(this);
00087   
00088   startTimer(50);
00089   
00090   setWindowTitle(fileName);
00091   setWindowIcon(QIcon(":/images/ogre.png"));
00092   setGeometry(50, 50, 1024, 768);
00093   
00094   setCentralWidget(ogreView);
00095   LOGI("MainWindow created");
00096 }
00097 
00101 MainWindow::~MainWindow(){
00102   delete objTab;
00103   objTab=NULL;
00104 }
00105 
00111 void MainWindow::scrollLog(){
00112         ogreLog->verticalScrollBar()
00113           ->setValue( ogreLog->verticalScrollBar()->maximum() );
00114 };

00119 void MainWindow::about(){
00120   QString ogreVersion = QString::number(OGRE_VERSION_MAJOR) + "." 
00121     + QString::number(OGRE_VERSION_MINOR) + "." 
00122     + QString::number(OGRE_VERSION_PATCH);
00123   QMessageBox::about(this, tr("About Show Mesh"),
00124         tr("Show Mesh %1\n").arg("1.1") +
00125         tr("Copyright (C) 2006 Quentin Bereau\n\n") +
00126         tr("Licensed under the GPLv2\n") +
00127         tr("Using Ogre %1 and Qt %2\n\n").arg(ogreVersion).arg(qVersion()) +
00128         tr("Developers:\n") +
00129         tr("Quentin Bereau <scratattack@users.sourceforge.net>\n") +
00130         tr("John Eric Martin <cpuwhiz105@users.sourceforge.net>"));
00131 }

00136 void MainWindow::createActions(){
00137   addObjAct = new QAction(QIcon(":/images/object.png"), tr("&Add Object"), this);
00138   addObjAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+O"));
00139   addObjAct->setStatusTip(tr("Add Object"));
00140   connect(addObjAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(addObj()));
00141   
00142   addLightAct = new QAction(QIcon(":/images/light.png"), tr("Add &Light"), this);
00143   addLightAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+L"));
00144   addLightAct->setStatusTip(tr("Add Light"));
00145   connect(addLightAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(addLight()));
00146   
00147   quitAct = new QAction(tr("&Quit"), this);
00148   quitAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+Q"));
00149   quitAct->setStatusTip(tr("Quit the application"));
00150   connect(quitAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(close()));
00151   
00152   scriptAct = new QAction(tr("&Set Script Path"), this);
00153   scriptAct->setStatusTip(tr("Set Script Path"));
00154   connect(scriptAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(setScriptPath()));
00155   
00156   textureAct = new QAction(tr("&Set Texture Path"), this);
00157   textureAct->setStatusTip(tr("Set Texture Path"));
00158   connect(textureAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(setTexturePath()));
00159   
00160   aboutAct = new QAction(tr("&About"), this);
00161   aboutAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+A"));
00162   aboutAct->setStatusTip(tr("About"));
00163   connect(aboutAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(about()));
00164 }
00165 
00169 void MainWindow::createMenus(){
00170   fileMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&File"));
00171   //fileMenu->addAction(newAct);
00172   fileMenu->addAction(addObjAct);
00173   fileMenu->addAction(addLightAct);
00174   fileMenu->addSeparator();
00175   fileMenu->addAction(quitAct);
00176   
00177   editMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&Edit"));
00178   matMenu = editMenu->addMenu(tr("&Materials Properties"));
00179   matMenu->addAction(scriptAct);
00180   matMenu->addAction(textureAct);
00181   
00182   helpMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&Help"));
00183   helpMenu->addAction(aboutAct);
00184 }
00185 
00189 void MainWindow::createToolBars(){
00190   fileToolBar = addToolBar(tr("File"));
00191   fileToolBar->addAction(addObjAct);
00192   fileToolBar->addAction(addLightAct);
00193 }

00200 void MainWindow::timerEvent(QTimerEvent* evt){
00201   Q_UNUSED(evt);
00202   statusBar()->clearMessage();
00203   
00204   QString fullMsg;
00205   fullMsg += "FPS : ";
00206   
00207   QString nbFPS;
00208   nbFPS.setNum(ogreView->getFPS());
00209   fullMsg += nbFPS;
00210   
00211   fullMsg += "     ";
00212   fullMsg += "Triangles : ";
00213   
00214   QString nbTriangles;
00215   nbTriangles.setNum(ogreView->getTriangles());
00216   fullMsg += nbTriangles;
00217   
00218   //POSITION
00219   fullMsg += "     ";
00220   fullMsg += "Position : ";
00221   
00222   QString camX;
00223   camX.setNum(ogreView->getPosCamera().x);
00224   fullMsg += camX;
00225   fullMsg += ", ";
00226   
00227   QString camY;
00228   camY.setNum(ogreView->getPosCamera().y);
00229   fullMsg += camY;
00230   fullMsg += ", ";
00231   
00232   QString camZ;
00233   camZ.setNum(ogreView->getPosCamera().z);
00234   fullMsg += camZ;
00235   
00236   //DIRECTION
00237   fullMsg += "     ";
00238   fullMsg += "Direction : ";
00239   
00240   QString dirX;
00241   dirX.setNum(ogreView->getDirCamera().x);
00242   fullMsg += dirX;
00243   fullMsg += ", ";
00244   
00245   QString dirY;
00246   dirY.setNum(ogreView->getDirCamera().y);
00247   fullMsg += dirY;
00248   fullMsg += ", ";
00249   
00250   QString dirZ;
00251   dirZ.setNum(ogreView->getDirCamera().z);
00252   fullMsg += dirZ;
00253   
00254   statusBar()->showMessage(fullMsg);//Update stats
00255 }
